mapper.sql: id, room_id, start_time, end_time, use_date, user
mapper.insert: insert into use_info (id, room_id, start_time, end_time, use_date, user) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{useDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into use_info
id,
room_id,
start_time,
end_time,
use_date,
user,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIME},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIME},

mapper.update:
update use_info
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME},
use_date = #{useDate,jdbcType=DATE},
user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update use_info set room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, use_date = #{useDate,jdbcType=DATE}, user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from use_info where use_date = #{useDate,jdbcType=DATE} and ( (start_time < #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME} and end_time > #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME} ) or (start_time < #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME} and end_time > #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME} ) or (start_time > '10:30:00' and end_time < '12:30:00' ))
